page.title: 03DISTRICT COUNCILLOR (1)
page.content: A{District Councillor}has a very busy life, solving other people's problems. Every 3 months she has a Council meeting. Also every 3 years they see if other people want to be elected to be the District Councillor for another three years. Our District Councillor has been one for nine years. Some days she gets many calls and others very few. There are 868 people in the{Woodford {Valley,}in{Durnford}there are 376 people. The area in Durnford, in hectares is 15,376. Just a few problems are that the elderly want more{buses}and young people want more cars and vans etc.
